scripts.build: npm run build:html && npm run build:pdf && npm run build:md
scripts.build:html: npx resume export --theme elegant --format html src/index.html
scripts.build:json:pdf: rm -f resume.json && npx jq "del(.work[3,4,5,6]) | del(.references[4,5,6]) | del(.basics.profiles)" resume-master.json >> resume.json
scripts.build:json:html: rm -f resume.json && npx jq "." resume-master.json >> resume.json
scripts.build:json:md: rm -f resume.json && npx jq "." resume-master.json >> resume.json
scripts.build:pdf: npx resume export --theme paper --format pdf travis_boudreaux_resume.pdf
scripts.postbuild:md: pwd && mv test.html README.md && rm -f test.html
scripts.deploy: aws s3 sync src s3://travisboudreaux.com --profile travis --acl public-read --exclude "*" --include "*"
scripts.postversion: git push origin HEAD && git push --tags
